title: Champ Select BUG!
body:
Just entered into champ select and was 3rd pick on purple side.
Champ select going as per usual, gets to the second rotation on purple side and client bugs.
Wouldn't allow me and 4th pick to select a champion and the client showed a new countdown.
Message up the top said 'Summoner 2 is selecting a champion' (**BLUE TEAM SECOND ROTATION AGAIN**).
Waited out the timer, and got a dodge and -3LP + 6 minute wait time before I could queue again.
There was no solution to this problem at the time, and I don't feel I should lose LP due to a bug.
Any solution to this problem?

replies.body:
[Report a Bug board.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report)

I wouldn't say that you would get your LP back or anything (or have the leaver marker removed from your account) because 1. no evident tangible proof and 2. it's against policy, much like refunding IP for people who purchased champions that were reworked.
